uniol.apt.adt

Class PetriNetOrTransitionSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.adt.PetriNetOrTransitionSystem

  • public class PetriNetOrTransitionSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that stores either a Petri net or a labeled transition system. The purpose of this class is to allow modules to take either a Petri net or labeled transition system; in particular, modules that check properties (e.g. reversibility) that apply to both Petri nets and labeled transition benefit from this class.
    Author:
    Renke Grunwald

      TransitionSystem getReachabilityLTS()
